00030 /* On windows, use the included sqlite3 library */
00031 #ifdef WINDOWS
00032 #import "sqlite3.h"
00033 #else
00034 #import <sqlite3.h>
00035 #endif
00036 
00037 /* On older versions of sqlite3, sqlite3_prepare_v2() is not available */
00038 #if SQLITE_VERSION_NUMBER <= 3003009
00039 #define PL_SQLITE_LEGACY_STMT_PREPARE 1
00040 #endif
00041
